Test.name: Inter platform communication via IIOP
Test.WhatTest: Tests sending and receiving a message to/from an agent on a remote platform.
Test.HowWorkTest: It uses the default IIOP MTP.
Test.WhenTestPass: The test passes if the agent on the remote platform receives the ping message and replies correctly and no exception is fired.

Test.name: Message Envelope transfer over IIOP MTP
Test.WhatTest: Test the correct transfer of the Message Envelope in communication across different platforms using the standard IIOP MTP.
Test.HowWorkTest: A message is exchanged between two agents living on different platforms with an Envelope including two properties: a Serializable object and a String. The message transfer occurs using the standard IIOP MTP.
Test.WhenTestPass: The test passes if the received Envelope includes the properties as they were set.
